thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com | 25 of 3545
thread.title: Chloe

author: Chloe
title: Chloe
text: I first learned of ThriftBooks when I was scrolling through Pinterest a few months ago. Once I got some money I wanted to spend, I went on. Man, was I impressed! They have the biggest selection I've ever seen, rivaling Barnes and Noble, and SO CHEAP! Most books they have are under $5. I can get seven hardcover books for the price of a new one! Even though they're all used, many don't have a single bent page. I have received books that were less than perfect, but nothing a bit of Scotch tape couldn't fix! Shipping is a bit slow, but it's free, so I won't complain ðŸ˜‰ This site is awesome!!!
